title: This Bitcoin Trader Went From A $1 Billion Long Position To Begging For Donations
description: "James Wynn" has dominated conversations on cryptocurrency Twitter for risky Bitcoin bets. Wynn appeared unstoppable at first, but his victory lap was brief....
